text.text: While the blueprints created by my teachers are more than sufficient for their simpler tools, this grimoire revolves around magic deeper than anything they could conceive of. As such, it comes with a variety of diagrams of my own design, constructed for the purposes required by the technological sorcery within.

Do not fret over the fragility of the equipment. As long as otherworldy power courses through its §cHeart§r, the machinery is almost invulnerable, though it is not immovable, and it's still possible to lose it in the infinite depths of the Void.
